description:
Hang out side by side and hang two hammocks from the same anchors. This system allows you to set up two hammocks parallel from each other, using the same trees. Great for when you want to be close to your friends, but not TOO close.

  • Foldable DAC aluminum poles are lightweight and strong
  • Wiregate end caps securely hold hammock cords
  • Weight capacity: 250lbs per hammock
  • Includes 2 poles
name: ENO Fuse Tandem Hammock System
